attributes.action: bring to an end cutbacks in the Royal Navy's fleet and to confirm and sign the order for a least two new aircraft carriers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The latest round of cuts proposed to the Royal Navy - mothballing of almost half the current fleet, not proceeding with the order for two new aircraft carriers and reducing the order for Type 45 destroyers - will be a disaster for Britain. It will leave our island nation undefended, we will be unable to protect our interests abroad, the final remnants of our ship building industry will be lost forever and we will suffer humiliation on the international status.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
